metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Given your enjoyment of shows like 'Love, Death & Robots', 'Fallout', and 'Stranger Things,' this anthology series explores dark and satirical themes related to technology and society, providing thought-provoking sci-fi narratives.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Since you enjoyed 'All Her Fault', 'The Night Manager', and 'HIS & HERS', this show offers compelling mysteries and complex characters, with a modern twist on the classic detective stories.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Considering your appreciation for comedies like 'Scrubs', 'Goodness Gracious Me', 'Ted Lasso', and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia', this sitcom delivers a similar style of humor with a cast of lovable characters and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: Based on your fondness for 'Stranger Things', 'Fallout', and animated comedies like 'Rick and Morty' and 'One-Punch Man', this series blends superhero action, sci-fi elements, and quirky humor.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Given your liking for 'Doctor Who', 'Rick and Morty', and general Sci-Fi with mystery elements as seen in 'All Her Fault', this show provides a bizarre, funny, and intricate mystery that blends science fiction with detective work in a unique and engaging way.
